sources.name: ADONETSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		CARGO_SERVICE_SEQ_NO as string,
		CARGO_SEQ_NO as string,
		WORK_ORDERNUMBER as string,
		SERVICE_LOCATION as string,
		SERVICE_CODE as string,
		SERVICE_DESCRIPTION as string,
		SERIVCE_REQUEST_DATE as string,
		SERVICE_COMPLETION_DATE as string,
		SERVICE_COMPLETION_CODE as string,
		SERVICE_START_DATE as string,
		SERVICE_END_DATE as string,
		F_SHOW_INT as string,
		F_SHOW_EXT as string,
		F_DELETE as string,
		F_ACTIVE as string,
		CREATED_DATE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		MODIFIED_DATE as string,
		MODIFIED_BY as string,
		ACCESSORY_CANCEL_REASON as string,
		ACCESSORY_COMMENT as string,
		SERVICE_CODE_GRP as string,
		CARGO_ID as string,
		CARGO_SERVICE_SEQ_NO as string,
		CARGO_SEQ_NO as string,
		WORK_ORDERNUMBER as string,
		SERVICE_LOCATION as string,
		SERVICE_CODE as string,
		SERVICE_DESCRIPTION as string,
		SERIVCE_REQUEST_DATE as string,
		SERVICE_COMPLETION_DATE as string,
		SERVICE_COMPLETION_CODE as string,
		SERVICE_START_DATE as string,
		SERVICE_END_DATE as string,
		F_SHOW_INT as string,
		F_SHOW_EXT as string,
		F_DELETE as string,
		F_ACTIVE as string,
		CREATED_DATE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		MODIFIED_DATE as string,
		MODIFIED_BY as string,
		ACCESSORY_CANCEL_REASON as string,
		ACCESSORY_COMMENT as string,
		SERVICE_CODE_GRP as string,
		CARGO_ID as string,
		ErrorCode as integer,
		ErrorColumn as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ADONETSource

sinks.name: ADONETDestination
sinks.script:
ADONETSource sink(mapColumn(
		CARGO_SERVICE_SEQ_NO,
		CARGO_SEQ_NO,
		WORK_ORDERNUMBER,
		SERVICE_LOCATION,
		SERVICE_CODE,
		SERVICE_DESCRIPTION,
		SERIVCE_REQUEST_DATE,
		SERVICE_COMPLETION_DATE,
		SERVICE_COMPLETION_CODE,
		SERVICE_START_DATE,
		SERVICE_END_DATE,
		F_SHOW_INT,
		F_SHOW_EXT,
		F_DELETE,
		F_ACTIVE,
		CREATED_DATE,
		CREATED_BY,
		MODIFIED_DATE,
		MODIFIED_BY,
		ACCESSORY_CANCEL_REASON,
		ACCESSORY_COMMENT,
		SERVICE_CODE_GRP,
		CARGO_ID
	)) ~> ADONETDestination
